posts.post_title: FS: T206 O'Hara PB, T213-1, SLers, HOFers & commons (updated 11/16)
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206s available for sale.  PM if interested.  I'll respond in order when I have time.  Give me up to 12 hours sometimes.:(
PMs responded to in order.
Prices include S/H.  Prices are net $$ to me.  PayPal FF or add 3%.

Offers welcome.

Click this link for pictures and prices:

[URL="http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/jp1216/for-sale-or-trade"]LINK #1[/URL]

Updated List (20+ cards):
HOFers
O'Hara Polar Bear SGC 10
T213-1 Coupon Carey
Lots of Southern Leaguers & HOFers.

Lots of singles (100+) available here too:

[URL="http://t206.weebly.com"]LINK #2[/URL]

All LOW grade stuff


 Removed items sold & updated list
